snippet: Thursday’s televised debate between Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Representative Paul D. Ryan attracted well over 50 million people — a significant chunk of the public, but a smaller total than the debate between the presidential...
abstract: Thursday’s televised debate between Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Representative Paul D. Ryan attracted well over 50 million people — a significant chunk of the public, but a smaller total than the debate between the presidential candidates last week.
lead_paragraph: Thursday’s televised debate between Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Representative Paul D. Ryan attracted well over 50 million people — a significant chunk of the public, but a smaller total than the debate between the presidential candidates last week. Read more on Media Decoder…

headline.main: Vice-Presidential Debate Draws More Than 50 Million Viewers
